description:
No. 1 business card scanning app, loved by 100 million users.

* Apple App Store Rewind 2011/2012 Top Business App 
* Must-Have Apps for Salespeople - Inc.com
* The business cards just jump into your phones. It’s that easy to use! - CBS TV
* Bringing Order to the Chaos of a Business Card Collection - The New York Times

CamCard reads and saves your business cards, remembering everyone you meet for business. It is the perfect fit for those who have lots of business cards or who love business social networking. 


Features
Cut Card Clutter
Quickly & accurately read business cards and save to your phone. 

Exchange E-Cards 
Exchange e-cards with contacts via QR Code, Card Radar or Private Group.

Contacts for Business Only
Make a standalone Contacts from your personal one. Make calls, send messages and locate company address on map.

Personal Profile
Enrich your profile with more information. Your contacts will be notified with every update of yours.

Keep You Posted
Get notifications on any updates of your business contacts. Be the first one to greet them on their promotions, new jobs or others.

Share Easily
Share cards via email, social network or QR code.

Company News
Get to know your customer’s company news instantly. Use it to break the ice and start a good conversation.

Lite CRM on your Mobile
Add notes in texts/image format, set reminders for follow-up. Remember every lead’s details to transfer them to a customer.

Manage Contacts on the Go
All your customer information can be synced across your smartphone, tablet and computer for easy management on the go.

Support 16 recognition languages: Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Korean, Norwegian, Japanese, English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Hungarian, Italian, Swedish, Russian.

About free version:
You can scan up to 200 cards in free version.

Check out INTSIG’s other apps
* CamScanner – Document scanning and sharing app
* CamDictionary – Snap Translator
* IS Contacts Kit – Back up all your contact with one tap
We’d love to hear your feedback, email us at isupport@intsig.com
Follow us on Twitter @camcardintsig 
Like us on Facebook with CamCard
Follow us on Google+: CamCard

releaseNotes:
In this update：
1.Optimized app interface & experience
2.Moved Group section to left side bar
3.Nearby Contacts upgraded to Card Radar, meet new friends nearby 
4.Optimized Note feature: support image/text note to keep track of all your communication activities
5.Show all your contacts near your current location in map
6.Add additional email addresses and phone numbers to Profile
7.Exchange cards in Private Group via invite code
8.Option to keep previous contact information when contacts update their cards
9.Other improvements and bug fixes
